_json.gridTitle: How to Save Animals With a Text Message | Actions | PETA
_json.description: Ever wonder where laboratories get the monkeys they test on from? They buy them from hellholes like Primate Products, Inc. (PPI), which houses hundreds of terrified monkeys. A disturbing PETA eyewitness investigation revealed that workers violently handled monkeys, terrorized them, and systemically neglected them. With one text message, you can send an e-mail to Florida officials demanding that they close PPI.  *Message and Data Rates May Apply. Text STOP to end, text HELP for info. Periodic...
